17.eng-name: The Book of Praying for Rain (Al-Istisqa')

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Zaid bin Khalid Al-Juhani said:"It rained during the time of the Prophet (ﷺ) and he said: 'Have you nt heard what your Lord said this night? He said: I have never sent down any blessing upon My slaves but some of them become disbelievers thereby, saying: 'We have been given rain by such and such a star.' As for the one who believes in Me and praises Me for giving rain, that is the one who believes in Me and disbelieves in the stars. But the one who says: 'We have been given rain by such and such a star' he has disbelieved in Me and believed in the stars

chapter.eng-name: It is Makruh to attribute rain to the stars
